title: Democracy in action: social security in the Federal Republic of Germany
creator_credit: Ifage Filmproduktion (DE) and Curt Gerd Lotze
brief_description: A comprehensive survey of the social security system in Germany - the care of the aged, the compulsory medical benefits scheme for the labour force, and unemployment benefits. Also profiles rebuilding of post-war West Germany.
